title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7202.13 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7202.13 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) Unless
otherwise prescribed by statute, there shall be no fee charged for: (1)
inspection of records; (2)
search for records; or
(3)
any certification pursuant to this

Part. (b) The fees for
copies of records shall be 25 cents per page of record not in excess of 9
inches x14 inches, or the actual cost of reproduction if the page is in excess
of 9 inches x 14 inches or is not capable of being photocopied. The fee for
copies of records may be waived in the discretion of the privacy compliance
officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7202.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
